overview: Manuel, an American who owns a neglected seaside Caribbean hotel, leaves it in the hands of Chango (the monkey). Chango invents a very unusual tequila mix that when Sapo Chuzman (the Frog), the most wanted and feared man in Mexico, hosts his best friend's wedding at the rundown hotel, it sends everyone into disarray including the police chief, the bride, and the hotel owner, Manuel.
title: Agave sorpresa
